Finally, we must emphasize how the inhibitory activity of XO that was firstly tested at biochemical laboratories [ 35] has recently been tested in silico using docking software [ 34]. This virtual approach has revealed that the inhibitory enzymatic action is related to the structural affinity of XO and E-caryophyllene [ 34]. This is consistent with the foregoing [ 38] experimental publications.
